程序包 org.bupt.persosnalfinance.dto

类 TransactionInformation

java.lang.Object
org.bupt.persosnalfinance.dto.TransactionInformation
public class TransactionInformation extends Object
Represents transaction information and provides static methods for managing a list of transactions including JSON persistence.
作者:
Jing Wenrui

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static List<TransactionInformation>
    transactionList
    A static list that stores all transaction records in memory.

  • 字段详细资料

    • transactionList

      public static List<TransactionInformation> transactionList
      A static list that stores all transaction records in memory.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • TransactionInformation

      public TransactionInformation(String date, double amount, String type, String object, String remarks)
      Constructs a transaction with all necessary details.
      参数:
      date - the date of the transaction (format: yyyy/MM/dd)
      amount - the amount of the transaction
      type - the type/category of the transaction
      object - the target/object involved in the transaction
      remarks - additional remarks or notes

  • 方法详细资料

    • getRemarks

      public String getRemarks()

    • addTransaction

      public static void addTransaction(TransactionInformation transaction)
      Adds a transaction to the static transaction list.
      参数:
      transaction - the transaction to add

    • saveToJSON

      public static void saveToJSON(String filename)
      Saves the current list of transactions to a JSON file.
      参数:
      filename - the file path where the JSON will be saved

    • loadFromJSON

      public static void loadFromJSON(String filename)
      Loads transaction records from a JSON file into the static list. Clears the existing list before loading.
      参数:
      filename - the path to the JSON file to load
